verbose_text: Finally, we determined the differences between the PJ34-and vehicle treated rats with respect to neurological deficits, infarct volume, neuronal loss and the expression of CD11b (a marker of microglial activation), glial cell line derived neurotrophic factor (GDNF) and tumor necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-alpha) at 1, 3 and 7 days after treatment.
evidence: expression of CD11b (a marker of microglial activation), glial cell line-derived neurotrophic factor
